  • | Nil a

display_html: type SimTrace a = Trace (SimResult a) SimEvent
name: SimTrace

display_html:
data Trace a b where
  • pattern SimTrace ∷ Time → ThreadId → Maybe ThreadLabel → SimEventType → SimTrace a → SimTrace a
  • pattern Trace ∷ Time → ThreadId → Maybe ThreadLabel → SimEventType → SimTrace a → SimTrace a
  • pattern TraceMainReturn ∷ Time → a → [Labelled ThreadId] → SimTrace a
  • pattern TraceMainException ∷ Time → SomeException → [Labelled ThreadId] → SimTrace a
  • pattern TraceDeadlock ∷ Time → [Labelled ThreadId] → SimTrace a
name: Trace SimTrace Trace TraceMainReturn TraceMainException TraceDeadlock

display_html:
data SimEvent = SimEvent {
  • seTime ∷ !Time
  • seThreadId ∷ !ThreadId
  • seThreadLabel ∷ !(Maybe ThreadLabel)
  • seType ∷ !SimEventType
}
name: SimEvent SimEvent seTime seThreadId seThreadLabel seType

display_html:
data SimResult a
  • = MainReturn !Time a ![Labelled ThreadId]
  • | MainException !Time SomeException ![Labelled ThreadId]
  • | Deadlock !Time ![Labelled ThreadId]
name: SimResult Deadlock MainReturn MainException

display_html:
data SimEventType
  • = EventSay String
  • | EventLog Dynamic
  • | EventMask MaskingState
  • | EventThrow SomeException
  • | EventThrowTo SomeException ThreadId
  • | EventThrowToBlocked
  • | EventThrowToWakeup
  • | EventThrowToUnmasked (Labelled ThreadId)
  • | EventThreadForked ThreadId
  • | EventThreadFinished
  • | EventThreadUnhandled SomeException
  • | EventTxCommitted [Labelled TVarId] [TVarId]
  • | EventTxAborted
  • | EventTxBlocked [Labelled TVarId]
  • | EventTxWakeup [Labelled TVarId]
  • | EventTimerCreated TimeoutId TVarId Time
  • | EventTimerUpdated TimeoutId Time
  • | EventTimerCancelled TimeoutId
  • | EventTimerExpired TimeoutId
name: SimEventType EventSay EventLog EventMask EventThrow EventThrowTo EventThrowToBlocked EventThrowToWakeup EventThrowToUnmasked EventThreadForked EventThreadFinished EventThreadUnhandled EventTxCommitted EventTxAborted EventTxBlocked EventTxWakeup EventTimerCreated EventTimerUpdated EventTimerCancelled EventTimerExpired

display_html: type TraceEvent = SimEventType
name: TraceEvent
